meta.subtitulo: Creation of a simple web page about "Hippos"

resumo.p: Creation of a simple web page about Hippos from scratch. Using HTML, and some CSS.
The main focus of this web page was to use the various HTML tags to represent the information. It was used lists, tables, images, bookmarks, horizontal rule, paragraphs and titles.
CSS was mainly used for the navbar.
There is only one file that contains all the HTML and CSS.hippo.html
All the images used are stored on the folder images
